testCases.summary: Verify userReporting permission visibility in UI
testCases.preconditions: User is logged in as Supervisor or Compliance Manager and on permissions management screen

steps.expectedResult: userReporting permission is visible in the list

testCases.summary: Verify assigning userReporting permission to role
testCases.preconditions: User is logged in as Supervisor or Compliance Manager

steps.step: Assign userReporting permission to Reporting Analyst role
Verify API access for users with assigned role
steps.expectedResult: Users with Reporting Analyst role can access Reporting API

testCases.postconditions: Permission is correctly assigned and functional

testCases.summary: Verify removing userReporting permission from role
testCases.preconditions: Reporting Analyst role has userReporting permission

steps.step: Remove userReporting permission from Reporting Analyst role

steps.expectedResult: Users with Reporting Analyst role cannot access Reporting API

testCases.summary: Verify error handling for non-existent role
testCases.preconditions: User is logged in as Supervisor or Compliance Manager

steps.step: Attempt to assign userReporting permission to non-existent role
steps.expectedResult: Error message 'Role does not exist' is displayed

testCases.summary: Verify audit logging for permission changes
testCases.preconditions: User is logged in as Supervisor or Compliance Manager

steps.expectedResult: Audit log entry shows assignment with timestamp and user info
Audit log entry shows removal with timestamp and user info

testCases.summary: Verify UI consistency with multiple role assignments
testCases.preconditions: User is logged in as Supervisor or Compliance Manager

steps.step: Assign userReporting permission to multiple roles
steps.expectedResult: UI remains consistent with existing screens
steps.testData: Roles: Reporting Analyst, Supervisor, Compliance Manager

testCases.preconditions: User is logged in as Supervisor or Compliance Manager
testCases.postconditions: Database records are accurate and persistent
